title: The Favorites - NFL Week 2 Betting Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 2 Betting Preview
description:
After kicking off the season with a sizzlin' 5-0 record in their Faves Five best bets, Action Network hosts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter return to survey the betting landscape for NFL Week 2. Together they look at underdogs, trap spots, struggling quarterbacks and so much more. Plus they remind themselves that winning ugly is the best way to win in the NFL. #Herd #ColinCowherd

#Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
